Package ohos.systemrestore

Contains two types of interfaces: SystemRestore as a public interface used for system restore, and ISystemRestoreProgressListener as an interface used for progress callback.

ISystemRestoreProgressListener Calls back the system restore progress. You must define how to implement this interface.

SystemRestore Contains interfaces related to system restore, for example, restoring factory settings, clearing the cache partition, and installing and verifying an OTA upgrade package.

Since:
1
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ISystemRestoreProgressListener
    Calls back the system restore progress.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    SystemRestore
    Provides interfaces to restore systems.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    SystemRestoreException
    Inherits from java.lang.Exception to describe customized system restore exceptions.
